questions.question: How can I help you today?
What kind of service are you looking for?
Are you looking for technical support?

responses.response: I'm a chatbot ready to help you with anything!
We offer a variety of services including web development, mobile apps, and AI solutions.
Our technical support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any issues.
Thank you! Feel free to ask anything else.
